Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Fresh, healthy Balinese food cooked on the same day. On Wednesdays and Thursdays they serve more special dishes such as Babi Guling, Nasi Ikan or Nasi Ayam Betutu that need longer cooking, while on Fridays and Saturdays they serve more ‚Ä¶

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text:
Incredible flavours and freshness with truly authentic Balinese ingredients and spices. This surely has to be one of Amsterdam‚Äôs if not the Netherlands hidden gems and best Indonesian places to eat or as i did get take away!
Ring in advance to avoid disappointment

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: First time trying the nasi babi guling! lots of flavours, lots of meat!

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: As an Indonesian living in the NL, I‚Äôve tried ALOT of Indonesian food at many tokos and restaurants. This place was recommended to me by another Indonesian friend, and the moment I took my first bite, my taste buds instinctively knew it was ‚Ä¶

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Small restaurant at the corner of a street and once you try the food you understand why it get so famous. Authentic, simple and delicious!  Hearty food, love it!!!

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: We tried the "Nasi Ayam" and was blown away by how delicious it was. Definitely not your usual Indonesian toko / take-away (afhalen). My wife is from Bali and according to her this is the closest you can get to an authentic Balinese taste here in the Netherlands.. Definitely worth all the effort trying to get there.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. A lovely couple run this restaurant with flavours to die for. It's clear this is a favourite with locals. So glad we made the trip from mainland Amsterdam. Definitely worth it.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Amazing fresh and authentic Balinese food. So happy to have this in my neighborhood.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Absolutely delicious and authentic. Best Indonesian restaurant I know in the Netherlands.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: I was born and raised in Bali, I can say this place is the closest thing you‚Äôll ever taste to Bali. Amazing local balinese taste. Friendly folks ‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: One of the best Indonesian food in the NL. Dian is a truly Balinese cook who aren't afraid to use the real Balinese spices and chillies. They have only one menu per day and the weekly menu will be posted on fb or instagram ... we are a big ‚Ä¶

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Best restaurant in Amsterdam. I love this place with all my heart ‚ù§ The food is phenomenal and the couple who run it are every bit as wonderful as there delicious menus

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: The best Bali food from Amsterdam!! Yes yes... The ayam betutut, the sambal matah, the salad named Lawar, the couple who runs this restaurant are waiting of you in real traditional Bali clothes. The interior and the atmospheres was so warm ‚Ä¶

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Amazing. Such good flavors and nice spices. Highly recommended!!

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Amazing food, friendly staff and great atmosphere. We‚Äôve been in Bali and this place rivals it in authenticity on all fronts. Highly recommended.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: If you are in the neighborhood (a twenty minute bike ride would still totally be in the neighborhood. That is how good it is), definitely go here! The food is so delicious, and definitely not blended down to be 'dutch-indonesian'. We traveled Sumatra for several weeks and still this restaurant is at the top of our list.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Just discovered it and it‚Äôs already my new favourite place to eat! Lovely couple running the place, legit Balinese flavours, proper spicy sambal, generous portions - my heart and belly are so happy üòç

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Super tasty you will not be disappointed, they also serve vegetarian options on Friday and Saturday for takeaway they serve it in cardboard boxes instead of the usual plastics tubs.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Spacious place, friendly service, delicious food and super cheap price for such a big portion in Amsterdam.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text:
Without a doubt this is THE BEST Indonesian/Balinese food in all of Netherlands, even better than any high-end and more expensive restaurants.
The babi guling dish is to die for.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Get my dinner here often... Really high quality... And I'm brought up in an indonesian family. All my friends I take here are also as excited and enthousiastic like me. Hope this caterer survives in this location..

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Great nasi babi guling. Comparable with or arguably better than on Bali. Food is bit spicy if not used to it.

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Always amazing quality and super fresh

Name: Paon Bali
Review Text: Tasty delicious proper Balinese food, huge portions and friendly staff. Great value. Can't go wrong :) Lekker

Name: Paon Bali

Name: Paon Bali
